data.prayer: Jesus, make the 822 people in the state of North Caicos who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of North Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of North Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of North Caicos.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of North Caicos, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of North Caicos an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 448 believers in North Caicos that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 448 believers in the state of North Caicos to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.focus_label: North Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands

location.name: North Caicos
location.full_name: North Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands
